dct_title_s: Map showing all the farm and boundary lines of the estates as they existed when in possession of the Apthorpe's, Vanderheuvel's, Somerindike's, Lawrence's, Harsen's, Cadel's, Dykeman's &c.
dct_description_sm: Cadastral map. Also shows names of adjacent landowners, positions of old roads and buildings and the original shoreline. Oriented with north to the upper left. Includes "Conveyances." Historic Maps copy has "c" added in ms. to "Dykeman's" in title. Includes ill., key, and insets of Declaration of Independence within illustrative border and map of Long Island. Relief shown by hachures. Hand colored. Map within decorative border.
dct_publisher_sm: [New York : City Surveyor, 187-?] (N[ew] Y[ork] : Mayer, Merkel & Ottmann, lith.)
